text:
This part of the Park Connector (PCN) is exactly in the middle between Kallang and Bishan.

It has one of the most scenic view when the sun is rising or setting. Almost breathtaking! Flank by St Andrew’s across both sides, it’s a perfect location to go for a walk, jog or cycle.

I’ve been running here every afternoon. Its a extremely beautiful and stuitable place for someone who want to jogging and take exercise here. From the water to flora, everything here is rrally worth to visit when you feeling down
Good park where you can jog and cycle. You can spot a lot of species of animals along too. I spotted a Grey heron and a family of otters there before:)
Well maintain pavement.  Opp cld due to  wip.  Nice short route for strolling.  ~5km between st andrew & tpy lor8 hawker centre.  Not crowded.  Copishop Nearby.
More buildings up along the river, so sad
